  2. Stellantis swiftly reshapes strategy under Elkann after Tavares exit  Reuters
  3. Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares lost control of the automaker with 'arrogant' mistakes, sources say  CNBC
  4. Carlos Tavares says ‘amicable’ Stellantis exit was due to disagreements on strategy  Automotive News
  5. As car dealers trash his legacy, ex–Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares says he wouldn’t act differently  Fortune
